sentence.Network_en: Air - conditioning ducts create a perfect Legionnaire's disease bacteria.
sentence.Network_cn: 空调系统 的输送管则是军团病细菌的绝佳温床.

sentence.Network_en: When activated, the legionnaire becomes immune to damage or knockdown effects for a moderate time.
sentence.Network_cn: 当激活这个技能时, 军团哨兵在一定时间内对伤害或击倒效果免疫.

sentence.Network_en: Through will alone, a legionnaire can become as implacable as the stone of the Deep Roads.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅凭借意志力, 一名军团成员可以变得如同深渊之路的岩石一样坚硬.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French légionnaire, from légion 'legion', from Latin legio (see legion)

means.word_mean: 1. a soldier who is a member of a legion (especially the French Foreign Legion)
